title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the goal of sustainable development.

For Task B, the response must correctly identify one sector of Nigeriaâ€™s economy in which sustainable development has been a serious challenge.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how economic factors influence environmental policy in Nigeria.

Points for each Task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
